articles.description: Looking to repair or replace your fence in North Texas? There are some basics you should know when it comes to the related laws and regulations. We’ve compiled some of the most important information to consider before starting your fence project.
With the world of information on the internet- including videos, tutorials and endless online forums- there’s been a rise in interest around “Do It Yourself” or DIY projects.

Want your fence to look great and last long? One of the keys is staining! Staining your fence helps protect it from the elements and prevents a variety of problems, including fading from UV rays, splintering, and rotting.
